oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CORE Organic pilot project PathOrganic - presentation at mid-term: risks and recommendations regarding human pathogens in organic vegetable production chains
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sessitsch, Angela
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presentation of the project with experience from the participants, including main results at mid-term, research ideas, experience with transnational research
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sessitsch, Angela (2009) CORE Organic pilot project PathOrganic - presentation at mid-term: risks and recommendations regarding human pathogens in organic vegetable production chains. Speech at: Joint meeting of the CORE Organic pilot projects coordinators and CORE Organic Funding Body Network, Rome, Italy, 8 June 2009.
